verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> long אָ֣נָה <S%H575><s%> How יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah תִּשְׁכָּחֵ֣נִי <S%H7911><s%> How long wilt thou forget נֶ֑צַח <S%H5331><s%> alway עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> long אָ֓נָה ׀ <S%H575><s%> How תַּסְתִּ֖יר <S%H5641><s%> hide אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> long אָ֨נָה <S%H575><s%> How אָשִׁ֪ית <S%H7896><s%> How long shall I take עֵצ֡וֹת <S%H6098><s%> counsel בְּנַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> in my soul יָג֣וֹן <S%H3015><s%> [having] sorrow בִּלְבָבִ֣י <S%H3824><s%> in my heart יוֹמָ֑ם <S%H3119><s%> daily עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> long אָ֓נָה ׀ <S%H575><s%> How יָר֖וּם <S%H7311><s%> be exalted אֹיְבִ֣י <S%H341><s%> enemy עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> over

הַבִּ֣יטָֽה <S%H5027><s%> Consider עֲ֭נֵנִי <S%H6030><s%> [and] hear יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> me O LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <S%H430><s%> my God הָאִ֥ירָה <S%H215><s%> lighten עֵ֝ינַ֗י <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> or אִישַׁ֥ן <S%H3462><s%> lest I sleep הַמָּֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> the [sleep of] death

פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> lest יֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> say אֹיְבִ֣י <S%H341><s%> Lest mine enemy יְכָלְתִּ֑יו <S%H3201><s%> I have prevailed צָרַ֥י <S%H6862><s%> against him [and] those that trouble יָ֝גִ֗ילוּ <S%H1523><s%> me rejoice כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when אֶמּֽוֹט׃ <S%H4131><s%> when I am moved

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <S%H589><s%> in בְּחַסְדְּךָ֣ <S%H2617><s%> in thy mercy בָטַחְתִּי֮ <S%H982><s%> But I have trusted יָ֤גֵ֥ל <S%H1523><s%> shall rejoice לִבִּ֗י <S%H3820><s%> my heart בִּֽישׁוּעָ֫תֶ֥ךָ <S%H3444><s%> in thy salvation
אָשִׁ֥ירָה <S%H7891><s%> I will sing לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> Because גָמַ֣ל <S%H1580><s%> because he hath dealt bountifully עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> the chief
